name: JohnGagz
description:
JohnGagz is a Player-mixed (Sonic, Mario, Marble Blast,Marble Madness, and Crash Bandicoot) for experts, whatever beginner-impossible levels to practice harder.

Over 80+ levels, 10 bonus levels, and 4 characters (JohnGagz, Juddie, Jackman, and Bohel).

Download at JohnGagzProject (the prototype from SAGE 2018) note: these prototype designs will be new redesigns at 2019.
